sentences.text: pulʲinaʔ sejtuʔ dʲez kuri ed kanʲeɡaʔ, axa
biinʲʔ iron, biinʲʔ iron, mɔdikoɡuu, ku tɛbuj ɛbunʲʔ
axa, pɔʃteu ed, kezem mɔʃtʃiʔ nʲiuʔ
a tʃike kezenʲʔ keboɔn dʲazuŋazʔ, dʲazuŋazʔ i nʲeu mɔdeeʔ, ku tɛbubiu

meta.author: author
meta.title: Hunting wild reindeer - Endangered Languages and Cultures of Siberia
